body_html: Thanks for the report. I have identified the cause and will fix it. It's a bit of an edge case. As a temporary workaround, you can skip the optimizer loading step when loading your model, by passing compile=False to load_model.
body_text: Thanks for the report. I have identified the cause and will fix it. It's a bit of an edge case. As a temporary workaround, you can skip the optimizer loading step when loading your model, by passing compile=False to load_model.
body: Thanks for the report. I have identified the cause and will fix it. It's a bit of an edge case. As a temporary workaround, you can skip the optimizer loading step when loading your model, by passing `compile=False` to `load_model`.
